title: #277: The Search For Forbidden Knowledge | Chris Mathieu
description:
Host of Forbidden Knowledge News and the Founder of the Forbidden Knowledge News Network, Chris Mathieu, stops by to spill the details of the insane stories and experiences that he has encountered over the years on his quest to find out the mysteries of the universe.

From interdimensional Bigfoot and telepathic Dogman to demonic attachments and military abductions, the world is a whole lot stranger than we seem to give it credit for. Those that have the courage to speak publicly about their experiences are often demonized and mocked by a skeptical general public, but the ones that have lived through these paranormal experiences often have a new appreciation and view of the world.

Is any of this actually true, or is it just the product of an overactive imagination and predisposed opinions on the topic? Maybe the best way to find out is to experience one of these encounters for ourselves.
